TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit HelpProvider extends System.ComponentModel.Component implements class System.ComponentModel.IExtenderProvider
Public Class HelpProvider Inherits Component Implements IExtenderProvider
public ref class HelpProvider : System::ComponentModel::Component, System::ComponentModel::IExtenderProvider

summary.span: 为控件提供弹出帮助或联机帮助。

span.span: Provides pop-up or online Help for controls.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 每个实例保持对与其关联的控件的引用的集合。Each instance of maintains a collection of references to controls associated with it. 若要将关联的帮助文件，将其设置属性。To associate a Help file with the , set the property. 指定通过调用提供的帮助类型方法并提供为指定的控件的值。You specify the type of Help provided by calling the method and providing a value for the specified control. 你提供的关键字或主题的帮助通过调用方法。You provide the keyword or topic for the Help by calling the method. 若要打开到特定主题的帮助，关键字应传递在窗体*topicName*.htm。To open Help to a specific topic, the keyword should be passed in the form *topicName*.htm. 若要将特定的帮助字符串与控件关联，请使用方法。To associate a specific Help string with a control, use the method. 当用户按下 F1 键，而在控件有焦点，您将使用此方法的控件相关联的字符串显示在弹出窗口。The string that you associate with a control using this method is displayed in a pop-up window when the user presses the F1 key while the control has focus. 如果未设置属性，则必须使用方法以提供帮助文本。If the property has not been set, you must use the method to provide the Help text. 如果同时设置了和的帮助字符串中，帮助基于将优先。If you have set both and the Help string, Help based on the will take precedence. 在调用方法类以提供的帮助功能。 calls methods on the class to provide Help functionality. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类包含四个地址字段窗体上显示上下文相关帮助。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display context-sensitive Help on a form containing four address fields. 该示例使用方法以设置的帮助的工具提示文本。The example uses the method to set the Help ToolTip text. 当您使用上下文相关帮助按钮并单击上的地址字段中，帮助光标帮助工具提示显示具有指定文本。When you use the context-sensitive Help button and click the Help cursor on an address field, the Help ToolTip appears with the specified text. 按 F1 键具有地址字段中焦点时，将显示 mspaint.chm 帮助文件，因为属性已设置为 mspaint.chm。When you press the F1 key with the focus in an address field, the mspaint.chm Help file is displayed because the property has been set to mspaint.chm. 方法调用为每个地址控件，以确定它是否有可用的帮助内容。The method is called for each address control to identify that it has Help content available. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/CPP/helpprovider.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/CS/helpprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/VB/helpprovider.vb#1)]

summary.span: 初始化 类的新实例。

span.span: Initializes a new instance of the class.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 创建的实例后类，而使用属性，方法，和方法将您的帮助主题与控件关联起来。Once you have created an instance of the class, use the property, method, and method to associate your Help topics with a control. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类包含四个地址字段窗体上显示上下文相关帮助。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display context-sensitive Help on a form containing four address fields. 该示例使用方法以设置的帮助的工具提示文本。The example uses the method to set the Help ToolTip text. 当您使用上下文相关帮助按钮并单击上的地址字段中，帮助光标帮助工具提示显示具有指定文本。When you use the context-sensitive Help button and click the Help cursor on an address field, the Help ToolTip appears with the specified text. 按 F1 键具有地址字段中焦点时，将显示 mspaint.chm 帮助文件，因为属性已设置为`mspaint.chm`。When you press the F1 key with the focus in an address field, the mspaint.chm Help file is displayed because the property has been set to `mspaint.chm`. 方法调用为每个地址控件，以确定它是否有可用的帮助内容。The method is called for each address control to identify that it has Help content available. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/CPP/helpprovider.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/CS/helpprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/VB/helpprovider.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 若要在运行时显示此帮助字符串，将用户按 F1 键时指定的控件具有输入的焦点。To display this Help string at run time, the user presses the F1 key while the specified control has the input focus. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用和类来筛选输入。The following code example shows how to use the and classes to filter input. 它还演示了方法。It also demonstrates the method. 这是一个完整的示例;它已准备好运行后将其添加到你的项目。This is a complete example; it is ready to run once you add it to your project. span.span: Gets or sets a value specifying the name of the Help file associated with this object.
The name of the Help file.

value.span: 其形式可以是 C:\path\sample.chm 或 /folder/file.htm。

span.span: This can be of the form C:\path\sample.chm or /folder/file.htm.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法检索到的文件名称标识此对象为其提供帮助的所有控件提供帮助支持的文件。The file name retrieved by this method identifies the file that provides Help support for all the controls for which this object provides Help. 已编译的帮助 (.chm) 文件或原始 HTML 文件，可以指定此文件的名称。This file name can designate either a compiled Help (.chm) file or a raw HTML file. ## Examples 下面的示例演示如何使用类包含四个地址字段窗体上显示上下文相关帮助。The following example demonstrates using the class to display context-sensitive Help on a form containing four address fields. 该示例使用以设置的帮助的工具提示文本。The example uses the to set the Help ToolTip text. 当使用上下文相关帮助按钮并单击地址字段上的帮助光标，帮助工具提示显示具有指定的文本。When using the context-sensitive Help button and clicking the Help cursor on an address field, the Help ToolTip appears with the specified text. 时按 F1 键具有一个地址字段中，在焦点`mspaint.chm`帮助文件将显示，因为属性已设置为`mspaint.chm`。When pressing the F1 key with the focus in an address field, the `mspaint.chm` Help file is displayed because the property has been set to `mspaint.chm`. 方法调用为每个地址控件，以确定它是否有可用的帮助内容。The method is called for each address control to identify that it has Help content available. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/CPP/helpprovider.cpp#1)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/CS/helpprovider.cs#1)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.HelpProvider/VB/helpprovider.vb#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 帮助关键字提供了要检索与指定的帮助文件从该控件关联的帮助的密钥信息属性。The Help keyword provides the key information to retrieve the Help associated with this control from the Help file specified by the property. 若要打开到特定主题的帮助，关键字应传递在窗体*topicName*.htm。To open Help to a specific topic, the keyword should be passed in the form *topicName*.htm. 若要清除关键字，调用方法替换`keyword`值`null`。To clear the keyword, call the method with a `keyword` value of `null`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 在指定的帮助字符串`helpString`参数显示在弹出窗口中，当用户指定的控件具有焦点时按 F1 键。The Help string that you specify in the `helpString` parameter is displayed in a pop-up window when the user presses the F1 key while the specified control has focus. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用类包含四个地址字段窗体上显示上下文相关帮助。The following code example demonstrates using the class to display context-sensitive Help on a form containing four address fields. 该示例使用方法以设置的帮助的工具提示文本。The example uses the method to set the Help ToolTip text. 当您使用上下文相关帮助按钮并单击上的地址字段中，帮助光标帮助工具提示显示具有指定文本。When you use the context-sensitive Help button and click the Help cursor on an address field, the Help ToolTip appears with the specified text. 按 F1 键具有地址字段中焦点时，将显示 mspaint.chm 帮助文件，因为属性已设置为`mspaint.chm`。When you press the F1 key with the focus in an address field, the mspaint.chm Help file is displayed because the property has been set to `mspaint.chm`. 方法调用为每个地址控件，以确定它是否有可用的帮助内容。The method is called for each address control to identify that it has Help content available.
